step_feedback.feedback: Great job starting with fists closed and arms in front of your chest. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
Excellent work opening your fingers and extending your arms horizontally. Keep exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you do this.
You're doing well with this step. Continue to focus on opening your fingers and extending your arms while exhaling and relaxing.
Good execution of this step. Ensure you are fully extending your arms horizontally to shoulder height and exhaling.
Fantastic job completing the repetitions! You're effectively opening your fingers and extending your arms while relaxing.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open and arms extended as you exhale and relax. This helps promote lymph drainage effectively.
